backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles and lead management with public lead submission and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides predefined short summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all site pages wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with business info, contact details, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with branding and navigation for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, page content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Custom hook that sets the document title and meta description tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactInqui: React Query mutation hook that submits contact form data via an actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, dark mode values, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Page displaying company information with branding, metrics, and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Page with a contact form, client-side validation, submission via mutation, WhatsApp link, and success state UI.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Image gallery page with lightbox dialogs and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section, navigation buttons, highlights, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Renders a menu page with SEO metadata, tabbed categories, and item lists styled using cards and Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services page with SEO setup and a grid of service cards each showing an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings for the site's maroon‑and‑gold design system.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, design requirements, features, and image assets for the Royal Bikana Caterers website build.
